efforts.name: Infrastructure Basics
efforts.description: Set up foundational infrastructure for running AI agents and workloads

projects.name: Initial Hardware Setup
projects.description: Assess and configure basic hardware requirements

tasks.title: ⭐ Assess current hardware capabilities
tasks.description: Review your existing hardware. Check CPU, memory, storage, and network capacity. Identify any gaps for running AI workloads and estimate resource needs.

tasks.title: Plan infrastructure needs
tasks.description: Determine what hardware you'll need. Consider: local vs cloud, GPU requirements, storage needs, network capacity, and scalability requirements.

tasks.title: Choose deployment model
tasks.description: Decide between cloud, on-premises, or hybrid deployment. Evaluate costs, security, and operational complexity for each option.

tasks.title: Set up basic monitoring
tasks.description: Configure basic system monitoring. Track CPU, memory, disk usage, and network activity to understand resource utilization.

tasks.title: Implement backup strategy
tasks.description: Set up automated backups for critical data and configurations. Define backup frequency, retention, and recovery procedures.

tasks.title: Document infrastructure setup
tasks.description: Document your hardware configuration, network setup, and deployment architecture. Keep diagrams and configuration details up to date.

projects.name: Security Configuration
projects.description: Implement security best practices for your infrastructure

tasks.title: ⭐ Configure firewall rules
tasks.description: Set up firewall rules to restrict access. Allow only necessary ports and services. Block unnecessary inbound connections.

tasks.title: Set up access controls
tasks.description: Implement proper user access controls. Use least privilege principle and separate admin accounts from regular users.

tasks.title: Configure SSL/TLS certificates
tasks.description: Set up SSL/TLS certificates for secure connections. Configure automatic renewal and proper certificate management.

tasks.title: Implement logging and auditing
tasks.description: Enable comprehensive logging for security events. Set up log aggregation and review processes for suspicious activity.

tasks.title: Set up intrusion detection
tasks.description: Configure basic intrusion detection. Monitor for unauthorized access attempts and unusual system behavior.

tasks.title: Create security documentation
tasks.description: Document security policies, procedures, and incident response plans. Keep security documentation accessible and up to date.

efforts.name: Resource Management
efforts.description: Optimize resource allocation and manage costs effectively

tasks.title: ⭐ Analyze resource usage patterns
tasks.description: Monitor and analyze how resources are used. Identify peak usage times, resource-intensive operations, and optimization opportunities.

tasks.title: Set resource limits
tasks.description: Configure resource limits for different workloads. Prevent any single process from consuming all available resources.

tasks.title: Implement resource quotas
tasks.description: Set up quotas for different users or projects. Ensure fair resource distribution and prevent overconsumption.

tasks.title: Create cost tracking
tasks.description: Set up cost tracking and reporting. Monitor spending on cloud resources, compute, storage, and network usage.

tasks.title: Plan for scaling
tasks.description: Design infrastructure that can scale. Plan for horizontal and vertical scaling based on workload demands.

tasks.title: Optimize resource allocation
tasks.description: Review and optimize resource allocation. Right-size instances, remove unused resources, and optimize for cost and performance.

projects.name: Performance Optimization
projects.description: Optimize infrastructure performance for AI workloads

tasks.title: ⭐ Benchmark current performance
tasks.description: Establish performance baselines. Measure response times, throughput, and resource utilization under typical workloads.

tasks.title: Identify performance bottlenecks
tasks.description: Analyze system performance to identify bottlenecks. Use profiling tools to find CPU, memory, I/O, or network constraints.

tasks.title: Optimize database performance
tasks.description: Tune database configurations, indexes, and queries. Optimize for your specific workload patterns and access patterns.

tasks.title: Implement caching strategies
tasks.description: Add caching layers to reduce load. Cache frequently accessed data, API responses, and computation results.

tasks.title: Optimize network configuration
tasks.description: Review and optimize network settings. Reduce latency, improve bandwidth utilization, and optimize routing.

tasks.title: Monitor and iterate
tasks.description: Continuously monitor performance metrics. Iterate on optimizations based on real-world usage patterns and feedback.

efforts.name: Operations & Maintenance
efforts.description: Establish operational procedures and maintenance routines

tasks.title: ⭐ Create operational runbooks
tasks.description: Document common operational tasks. Include step-by-step procedures for deployments, updates, and troubleshooting.

tasks.title: Set up automated deployments
tasks.description: Automate deployment processes. Reduce manual errors and enable faster, more reliable deployments.

tasks.title: Implement health checks
tasks.description: Set up health check endpoints and monitoring. Automatically detect and alert on service failures or degradation.

tasks.title: Create incident response procedures
tasks.description: Document procedures for handling incidents. Define escalation paths, communication plans, and recovery steps.

tasks.title: Set up maintenance windows
tasks.description: Schedule regular maintenance windows. Plan updates, patches, and system maintenance during low-traffic periods.

tasks.title: Document operational contacts
tasks.description: Maintain a list of key contacts for different systems and services. Include vendors, support contacts, and internal experts.

projects.name: Monitoring & Alerting
projects.description: Set up comprehensive monitoring and alerting

tasks.title: ⭐ Configure monitoring dashboards
tasks.description: Set up dashboards to visualize system health. Monitor key metrics: CPU, memory, disk, network, and application performance.

tasks.title: Set up alerting rules
tasks.description: Configure alerts for critical issues. Set appropriate thresholds and ensure alerts are actionable and not noisy.

tasks.title: Implement log aggregation
tasks.description: Centralize log collection from all systems. Enable easy searching and analysis of logs across your infrastructure.

tasks.title: Create performance reports
tasks.description: Generate regular performance reports. Track trends, identify issues, and measure improvements over time.

tasks.title: Set up capacity planning
tasks.description: Monitor resource trends to predict future needs. Plan capacity increases before hitting limits.

tasks.title: Review and optimize alerts
tasks.description: Regularly review alert effectiveness. Reduce false positives, tune thresholds, and ensure alerts lead to action.
